price: Sesungguhnya orang-orang munafik itu (ditempatkan) pada tingkatan yang paling bawah dari neraka.  Dan kamu sekali-kali tidak akan mendapat seorang penolong pun bagi mereka.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ فِي ٱلدَّرۡكِ ٱلۡأَسۡفَلِ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُمۡ نَصِيرًا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna al-munāfiqīna fī al-darki al-asfali mina al-nāri walan tajida lahum naṣīran
